DOC.brief_summary: A follow-up intervention climacteric symptom nurse Peking
DOC.detailed_description: As know , hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) main therapy climacteric symptoms.But HRT also disadvantage include breast cancer , cardiovascular disease , especially long period HRT . It make u find non-hormone therapy . So want investigate exercise effect climacteric symptoms.Doing exercise helpful avoid treat many disease , include climacteric symptoms.In previous research , find play exercise treat moderate climacteric symptom .
DOC.criteria: nurse , aged4055 , live peking , among perimenopausal woman .
